entry.title: RT Cullen Roche: Housing is 45% of CPI. This is a multi-year disinflationary trend that's only just starting. To get a big resurgence in inflation you...
entry.summary:
RT Cullen Roche Housing is 45% of CPI. This is a multi-year disinflationary trend that's only just starting. To get a big resurgence in inflation you're going to need some outlier surge in prices like commodities. Not happening so far this year....
Carl Quintanilla: SF FED: “Our baseline forecast suggests that year-over-year shelter inflation will continue to slow through late 2024 and may even turn negative by mid-2024 .. the most severe contraction in shelter .. since the Global Financial Crisis ..” @sffed #CPI https://www.frbsf.org/economic-research/publications/economic-letter/2023/august/where-is-shelter-inflation-headed/

entry.summary: Re PayPal 稳定币于2022年初被发现，随后波折不断，除上述 FTX 暴雷外，2023年初因为合作伙伴 Paxos 遭调查与起诉而暂停。目前由于主要公链代币均被美国 SEC 列为证券，PYUSD 扩展到其他链上的概率变得相对困难。

entry.summary: CoinsPaid 披露遭到朝鲜 Lazarus 集团社会工程学攻击的细节。一名工程师以为自己正在接受 Cryptocom 利润丰厚的工作的面试，因此下载了恶意软件，作为技术测试的一部分。下载恶意代码使朝鲜黑客能够访问 CoinsPaid 的系统，利用软件漏洞成功伪造从 CoinsPaid 热钱包提取资金的授权请求，盗走了约 3700…

entry.summary: Sino Global 向 FTX-Alameda 提出 6​​700 万美元索赔。Sino Global 于 2021 年与 FTX 创始人 SBF 联合推出基金 Liquid Value fund，该基金旨在针对高净值个人筹集 2 亿美元。截至 2022 年 1 月，该基金已筹集 9000 万美元，FTX 为主要投资者。（CoinDesk）https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2023/08/07/sino-global-files-67m-claim-against-ftx-alameda/

entry.summary: 吴说获悉，KuCoin 宣布进一步加强 KYC 政策，要求新注册用户必须完成 KYC，需要上传身份证件信息，并且完成人脸识别；旧用户如果没有完成 KYC，则只能使用：币币卖出、合约平仓、杠杆平仓、理财赎回、ETF赎回等服务；同时无法使用充值服务（提现不受影响）。https://www.kucoin.com/zh-hant/announcement/en-announcement-regarding-kucoin-s-upgraded-standard-user-identity-verification-procedure?utm_source=TwitterContent

entry.summary: 据彭博社报道，PayPal 周一表示将推出美元稳定币 PayPal USD（PYUSD），Paxos Trust Co.发行。PYUSD 由美元存款、短期国债和类似现金等价物支持，将逐步向 PayPal 在美国的客户开放。 https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-08-07/paypal-launches-us-dollar-stablecoin-pyusd-for-payments-transfers

entry.summary:
吴说获悉，YGG 现货价格今日最高涨至 0.99 美元，较币安上线合约前的 0.25 美元涨幅超 300%；YGG 合约价格最高涨至 0.75 美元，涨幅超过200%。据 Coinglass 数据，当前 YGG U 本位合约年化资金费率在各大交易所均在 -1600% 以上，在币安上为 -2737.5%。 https://www.coinglass.com/zh/FundingRate
吴说区块链: 吴说获悉，据 Coinglass 数据，在 Binance 上线 YGG U 本位永续合约后，近 24 小时 YGG 涨幅超 70%，全网 YGG 衍生品期货交易量达 39.5 亿美元，仅次于 BTC 和 ETH；当前 Binance YGG U 本位永续合约大户人数多空比为 0.1936，持仓多空比为 0.7858。https://www.coinglass.com/

entry.title: RT sassal.eth 🦇🔊: I see this question a lot - my answer: The below tweet is assuming that ETH gets most of its value from its use as a fee token...
entry.summary:
RT sassal.eth 🦇🔊 I see this question a lot - my answer: The below tweet is assuming that ETH gets most of its value from its use as a fee token when imo this is not true. I rank the value accrual properties like this: 1. Store of Value/money 2. Staking asset 3. Collateral asset 4. Use as fee…
Mippo 🟪: @sassal0x @iamDCinvestor Genuine question: if rollups can do (most) of what Eth L1 can, at a fraction of the cost, with their own token, why is this bullish Eth token price? Also add in the fact that Eth is lowering the rent they charge for rollups specifically.

entry.summary: Re @RNR_0 Technically it’s not a probability of 1/6. If 5/6 chambers are empty then bullet will be heavier. So when you spin it it’s more likely to not be at the top hole, because gravity.
